title: Lab Blog & Updates
description: Insights, stories, and research updates from the CoMPhys Lab.

posts.title: Unraveling Hypersonic Flow Physics
posts.author: Dr. P.K. Seshadri
posts.summary: We explore the role of rarefaction and thermal nonequilibrium in hypersonic boundary layers using DSMC and Navier-Stokes solvers.

posts.title: Summer Research Intern Diaries 2024
posts.author: Priya R.
posts.summary: An undergraduate intern shares her experience working on AI-assisted simulation tools for turbulent flows.

posts.title: Paper Accepted at AIAA SciTech 2025
posts.author: CoMPhys Team
posts.summary: Our latest work on detonation modeling using machine learning will be presented at AIAA SciTech.
